DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study investigate safety LY3323795 effect body . The study drug placebo ( sugar pill ) give mouth healthy participant . The study three part . Each participant may enroll one part . The study last 14 43 day , depend part . Screening must complete prior study start .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchildbearing potential time screen Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m² ) 32.0 kg/m² , inclusive Have participate , within last 30 day , clinical trial involve investigational product . Have QT correct heart rate ( QTc ) ( use Bazett 's formula ) interval value great 450 millisecond ( msec ) ( male ) great 470 msec ( female )
